item.description:
LOCATION POSTED!

NEW & IMPROVED TIME: 6 PM!
http://bostinno.com/2012/10/25/boston-halloween-pub-crawl-places-to-go-parties/

LOCATION: Winthrop Square (corner of JFK & Mt. Auburn St). It is an interval between the Cellar Dweller Pub crawl posted with 5 other Meetup.com groups!
It'll be dark so bring blinking bike lights!

THIS IS A DANCE WALKING FITNESS EVENT to be FOLLOWED by a "dance drinking" PUB CRAWL (DANCE BETWEEN THE PUBS!!) Will be in Harvard Sq. 
 
The SPOOKY SILENT DISCO IS ALSO POSTED TO Boston Social Fitness, & FACEBOOK.  The CELLAR DWELLER PUB CRAWL (LINK BELOW) is itself co-posted to Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, Boston Happy Hour, & Pub Crawlers of Boston.

Free. The last Dance Walking Fitness event on the Boston Common (Sept 1) was a fabulous success.

Above is an actual photo the June 9 meetup w/ the Boston Society of Sponteneity & thanks to them! This is again co-posted to their Facebook page!
http://www.facebook.com/events/401789569888982/

When we danced a "silent disco" near the Park St. T, people were literally lining up rows of chairs to watch us:

https://www.facebook.com/SOScities#!/events/264774256955467/
This time lets wear some Halloween stuff, wigs or makeup or masks or bells or flounces or ribands or false mustaches/eyeballs or an eccentric cape to keep warm & stun & confound passers by all the more.

What is Dance Walking Fitness?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ib3Duz_6a9M

Following this event we join the Cellar Dweller Pub Crawl at 6:40 PM. Come along if you like. (Crawl route: click on the first Facebook link, above). 
We can dance walk the route between these pubs if interested. Some people don't drink & that is fine.

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/63400142/

Bring your cameras! If it rains we will post a "rain route" to keep dry.
item.how_to_find_us: Route TBA disclosed 24 hours before, will be in Harvard Sq.
item.name: Spooky Silent Disco (Harvard Sq).
